snippet: Senator Robert Menendez, a Democrat, said the agreement did not go far enough to limit Tehran’s potential to pursue a weapons program.
abstract: Sen Robert Menendez, Democrat of New Jersey, says he will vote against nuclear deal with Iran, saying it does not go far enough to limit country's potential to carry out a weapons program.
lead_paragraph: Senator Robert Menendez, a Democrat, said the agreement did not go far enough to limit Tehran’s potential to pursue a weapons program.

headline.main: Robert Menendez Says He’ll Vote Against Iran Nuclear Deal
headline.print_headline: Menendez to Vote ‘No’ on Iran Nuclear Deal
